description: Try our easy to follow Vegetable Korma Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Korma,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Rice,Sweet potato,Cauliflower
name: Vegetable Korma Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 tbs vegetable oil (save 2 tbs extra for curry paste)

recipeInstructions.text: To make the korma curry paste, process onion, garlic, coconut, cashew nuts, chillies, spices, 1/3 cup water and oil in bowl of a food processor until a thick paste forms.
Peel and quarter the sweet potato lengthways, then cut crossways into 2cmthick slices.
Heat vegetable oil in a large saut√© pan. Add paste, cook stirring for 5 minutes or until fragrant.
Add sweet potato, cauliflower, 2 cups water and coconut cream. Simmer, uncovered for 1520 minutes, or until vegetables are tender. Add capsicum and peas. Cook for 2 minutes. Season to taste.
Serve vegetable korma with basmati rice and yoghurt. Garnish with coriander.
